phrases: You are back at the head of the class.
I was worried with your grades dropping there for a while,
but it looks like you have straightened out your act.
Maybe it is because entrance exams are looming...
I never thought they would agree to open up the roof, but they went right for it.
I heard a third-year thug was monopolizing the key up'til now.
I am playing volleyball with the girls.
I know you are lonely without Kawabuchi-kun, but you have got to get over it.
I bet you are looking for Nishimi-kun?
I love milkshakes when it starts getting cold outside!
Could it be you are worried about Kawabuchi-kun after he disappeared?
It is Nishimi-san, is not it?
Like, you have not been able to talk at all or go home together recently?
You need to make things happen yourself...
You have got whipped cream on your mouth.
You are not coming to the basement today, either?
With entrance exams coming up, I have decided not to go for a while.
Tell Pops that I am sorry for not being able to come.
Why not study at my place?
He is off buying up stock, so it is just me today.
I always have it out here.
Both of you look so happy in the picture.
So first of all, the word order is reversed.
This so comes before, and the subject and verb change places.
Um... I am sorry about before.
I was not thinking about how you felt when I showed you that photo...
Since Sentaro left, you are the one it is hit the hardest, is not it?
He may not be around, but I have still got you, Ri-chan.
I am glad he is gone.
Now I can be alone with you whenever I want.
You are happy that Sentaro is gone...?
Even if you are joking, I do not want to hear such a thing!
Ri-chan, I have not been able to say this before...
I will go home for today.
Why did things turn out like this?!
They did not call Kawabuchi-kun's name, huh?
Everyone is going their own way.
We will all forget being here in no time.
I will not ever forget you two's performance at the school festival last year!
Could I have the second button on your jacket?
Sure, if you would be satisfied with mine...
I was not sure if I would be able to ask you...
I was crying my eyes out...
Farewell and good riddance to this damned slope!
Do not go trudging up the thing tomorrow out of habit!
So you are going off to a college in Tokyo too, huh, Richie-rich?
Well, it will probably get a little lonely around here...
Nah, we cannot get gloomy about it.
It is great news, is not it?
Ritsuko was accepted at the college here.
You can stay there, but just listen!
I am sorry about that day!
You may not want to hear anything from me, but just let me say this!
The reason I started coming here is because I wanted to see your smile!
Ri-chan, your smile always encouraged me, even when things were rough.
I never knew that feeling before meeting you...
Call us as soon as you get there.
The sleeper express train, Sakura, will depart for Tokyo on track one.
Its next stop will be Haiki.
All passengers, please get on board.
But there is a lunch in there that Ritsuko made for you.
When you are sick, you are apt to lose heart,
but like they say, sickness and health start with the mind.
Doctor, you have a good head on your shoulders for someone so young.
Dr. Nishimi, we have got an emergency.
Okay, I will be right there!
Hey, there is a free bed in the nap room.
Why do not you get a little rest?
No, if I lie down now, it is all over.
I will not be able to come back.
Yeah, being a resident on the night shift is even harder than I heard it would be.
It takes a lot of stamina.
Our guest is a popular star who both sings and acts...
Matsuoka Seiji-san joins us in the studio today!
I want to start right off with a question.
Which do you like better, singing or acting?
My little sister goes nuts over that guy!
Oh, I am six months along.
Junichi-san wants a girl, but I wonder...
I think he would spoil her rotten.
Do you still play the piano?
I would heard that Sentaro had taken off, but you have never seen him since then?
This is no time to be catching up.
There is something I have been carrying around to show everyone.
A friend from back home sent me this photo,
but do not you think the person on the far left looks like someone we know?
What the hell am I doing?
I have been trying to forget him all this time, but my heart is beating fast.
There is no way I can stop this rhythm in my heart.
If you want the church, it is at the top of the slope.
The priest here has been around for years and years.
Yeah, I think he helps raise the orphans from around the prefecture...
Though I hear he does nothing but because trouble for the poor priest...
Do not see this every day!
I always thought this day might come sometime...
What do you two think you are doing?!
I told you that you can only play on special occasions, but again, you do as you please!
I forget what I was like before I met you
Kick my heels going down the slope
It is like an endless summer vacation
Feels like sneakin' into the swimming pool
Hey, let us swim with our clothes on, jump in!!
This beat that pierces my heart is strange
It is been a long time.
I am writing now because there is something I want to tell you, Ritsuko-chan.
A friend of mine from back home got married at a church, and in a photo of the ceremony that she sent me, there is a priest who resembles Sentaro-san.
I am not sure of it, but thought it would be worth looking into.
The church is on a small island, so it should be easy to find.
I just wrote this postcard to let you know.
If you find anything out, please write back.
Do not you go, it is twined around my ears
and will not leave me ever again
I waited for you on that slope
There was a'goodbye' blurred far away
I was so weak, so awkward, and so fragile back then
But you gave me a small pair of wings
In the twilight hour of the sky,
I am searching for a gleam of light
If only I could have said that I love you
The note that I wrote in the corner of my textbook
has never been delivered to this day
